author: mrglavas
msg: Comments and PIs are expected to be present in the XDM tree for assertions. Make sure we pass them to the validator when schema version is 1.1. We can still bypass the validator when we're in XML Schema 1.0 mode.

author: mukulg
msg: adding support for comment and PI nodes for XML Schema 1.1 assert XDM trees. this was possible after yesterday's enhancement by Michael Glavassevich adding support for this in earlier stages of XSD validation pipeline.

author: ggregory
msg: Expand messages to Assert calls to debug failing Gump tests.
